member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.AetheriumCompatibility
member.summary: A static class that contains compatibility features from Aetherium mod.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.AetheriumCompatibility.enabled
member.summary: The check to use if Aetherium mod is enabled. Always do an if check before invoking methods in this class or else unexpected errors will happen in-game.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.AetheriumCompatibility.AddCustomDrone(System.String)
member.summary: Allows the Inspiring Drone to inspire the custom drone.
member.param: The Character Master name of the drone to add

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.ChensClassicItemsCompatibility
member.summary: A static class that contains compatibility features from Chen's Classic Items.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.ChensClassicItemsCompatibility.enabled
member.summary: The check to use if Chen's Classic Items mod is enabled. Always do an if check before invoking methods in this class or else unexpected errors will happen in-game.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.ChensClassicItemsCompatibility.TriggerArtillery(RoR2.CharacterBody,System.Single,System.Boolean,RoR2.ProcChainMask)
member.summary: Uses the API to allow Arms Race item to be triggered when invoked.
member.param: Body of the object that triggered the proc
Final damage output
Determines if the artillery will be a critical
Proc Chain Mask

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.ChensClassicItemsCompatibility.DroneRepairKitSupport(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uses the API to allow Drone Repair Kit to support custom drones.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone`1
member.summary: Allows for making drone classes into singleton classes.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone`1.instance
member.summary: The instance of the singleton class.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone
member.summary: The drone class where mod creators should inherit from to ease up development.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.enabled
member.summary: Determines if the drone should be enabled/disabled. Disabled drones will not be set up.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.canBeInspired
member.summary: Aetherium Compatibility: Determines if this drone can be inspired by the Inspiring Drone.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.affectedByDroneRepairKit
member.summary: Chen's Classic Items Compatibility: Determines if this drone can be healed by Drone Repair Kit.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.name
member.summary: Fetches the custom drone's class name.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.alreadySetup
member.summary: Used to determine if the custom drone was already set up.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.configCategory
member.summary: The category that will be used in the config file that contains the custom drone's config options.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.config
member.summary: The config file assigned to this custom drone. Use this to bind config options.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.PreSetup
member.summary: The first step in the setup process. Place here the logic needed before any processing begins.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.SetupConfig
member.summary: The second step in the setup process. Place here all the code related to adding configurations for the custom drone.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.SetupComponents
member.summary: The third step in the setup process. Place here all initialization of components, assets, textures, sounds, etc.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.SetupBehavior
member.summary: The fourth step in the setup process. Place here the code related to the drone's behavior. One may place here mod compatibility code. Hooks should also go here.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.PostSetup
member.summary: The fifth step in the setup process. Place here the code for cleanup, or for finalization. This will still be performed whether the drone is enabled or disabled. This will still also be performed if the drone was already set up or not.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.SetupFirstPhase
member.summary: First phase of the setup process along with required logic. This phase invokes SetupConfig. This method is exposed for usage outside of this class.
member.returns: True means the setup was performed. False means the setup was skipped or the drone is disabled.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.SetupSecondPhase
member.summary: Second phase of the setup process along with required logic. This method invokes SetupComponents. This method is exposed for usage outside of this class.
member.returns: True means the setup was performed. False means the setup was skipped or the drone is disabled.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.Drone.SetupThirdPhase
member.summary: Third phase of the setup process along with required logic. This method invokes SetupBehavior. This method is exposed for usage outside of this class.
member.returns: True means the setup was performed. False means the setup was skipped or the drone is disabled.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneCatalog
member.summary: A static class that caters initializing and registering custom drones.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneCatalog.Initialize(System.String,BepInEx.Configuration.ConfigFile)
member.summary: Generates a list of data containing the custom drones of the mod that called this method.
member.param: The mod GUID
The file where the mod's custom drones will bind their configs
member.returns: A list of DroneInfos from the mod that called this method.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneCatalog.SetupAll(System.Collections.Generic.List{Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo})
member.summary: Sets all the custom drones contained in the list up. Mod creators may instantiate the drones their own if they have a sophisticated logic. This flavor shows the normal way of setting up the drone instances. The phases will still capture generic flags such as if the drone is enabled or not, or if the drone was already set up or not.
member.param: List of DroneInfos generated by Initialize

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneCatalog.EfficientSetupAll(System.Collections.Generic.List{Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo})
member.summary: Sets all the custom drones contained in the list up. Mod creators may instantiate the drones their own if they have a sophisticated logic. This flavor comes with efficient an setup by taking advantage of the boolean return values of each phase.
member.param: List of DroneInfos generated by Initialize

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneCatalog.ScopedSetupAll(System.Collections.Generic.List{Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo})
member.summary: Sets all the custom drones contained in the list up. Mod creators may instantiate the drones their own if they have a sophisticated logic. This flavor does a scoped setup, effective if the custom drones are coded in such a way they have no dependent/shared components/behaviors from one another.
member.param: List of DroneInfos generated by Initialize

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo
member.summary: A structure that stores data of custom drones as well as where they originated from.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo.mod
member.summary: Mod identifier for differentiation, preferably the GUID.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo.instance
member.summary: The instance of a Drone.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo.#ctor(System.String,Chen.GradiusMod.Drone,BepInEx.Configuration.ConfigFile)
member.summary: Basic constructor that stores the data of a custom drone.
member.param: Mod identifier
Instance of the drone
Config file to bind onto

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo.Equals(Chen.GradiusMod.DroneInfo)
member.summary: Compares this instance and the other to see if they are "equal" as defined. For equality, always use this method instead of equality operators.
member.param: The other instance being compared with
member.returns: True if equal, false if not.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.BodyRotation
member.summary: A component that allows the model to be rotated along the Z-axis. May be useful to certain custom drones and some behavioral effects.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.BodyRotation.rotationSpeed
member.summary: The constant base speed of which the object will rotate around the Z-axis.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.BodyRotation.rotationDirection
member.summary: The direction of the rotation. This should only be 1, 0 or -1. Anything less or greater will cause faster rotation. 0 will not let it rotate.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.BodyRotation.accelerate
member.summary: A flag to toggle if the model should accelerate in rotating.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.BodyRotation.acceleration
member.summary: The rate at which the rotation speed will accelerate.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.BodyRotation.maxRotationSpeed
member.summary: The maximum rotation speed that the model can achieve.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneDeathState
member.summary: An Entity State that should inherit from the original EntityStates.Drone.DeathState. The original code does not support custom spawn cards to be detected when dying so that the interactable can spawn again. This state will cater to custom drones so they are also able to spawn interactables upon death. Do not use this class directly. Always inherit from this class and implement the interactable property.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneDeathState.GetInteractableSpawnCard
member.summary: A method that should be implemented by the child class. This will be the Spawn Card that will be used to spawn when the drone is destroyed.
member.returns: The spawn card of the interactable if implemented.
member.exception: Thrown when the Property is not implemented.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneDeathState.OnInteractableSpawn
member.summary: A method that can be overridden to add or change the logic when the interactable is spawned. Default logic is to compute for the scaled cost of the drone.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneDeathState.OnImpactServer(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Overridden method from the original state so that it would instead spawn the specified interactable's spawn card. There is no need to override this unless special behavior is needed.
member.param: The point where the interactable spawns

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneDeathState.OnEnter
member.summary: Overrideable OnEnter method from the original state. Always call base.OnEnter. Initialize values at runtime here. To perform the death behavior specified in OnImpactServer, destroyOnImpact must be set to true. This method already does that so long as base.OnEnter is invoked.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneDeathState.OnExit
member.summary: Overrideable OnEnter method from the original state. Always call base.OnExit.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.DroneDeathState.FixedUpdate
member.summary: Overrideable OnEnter method from the original state. Always call base.FixedUpdate.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusModPlugin
member.summary: The mother plugin that allows the mod to be loaded to RoR2.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusModPlugin.ModVer
member.summary: The version of the mod.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusModPlugin.ModName
member.summary: The name of the mod.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusModPlugin.ModGuid
member.summary: The GUID of the mod.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionBehavior
member.summary: A component attached to the Options/Multiples for their behavioral functions.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionBehavior.owner
member.summary: The Character Body Game Object of this Option's owner.

member.name: F:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionBehavior.numbering
member.summary: The number that represents the identification of the Option scoped under the owner.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionBehavior.DecidePosition(System.Single)
member.summary: Computes for the actual position of the Option based on the owner's rotational variables and its numbering.
member.param: The angle to compute from

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker
member.summary: A component attached to a Character Body that may own Options/Multiples. The mod handles attaching the component when necessary.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker.currentOptionAngle
member.summary: Property that stores the current positional angle from the owner. Useful for determining patterns relative to the Option's angle.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker.masterCharacterMaster
member.summary: The Character Master of this Game Object's owner through Minion Ownership component.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker.characterMaster
member.summary: Character Master of this Game Object.

member.name: P:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker.characterBody
member.summary: Character Body of this Game Object.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker.GetRotateMultiplier
member.summary: Fetches the rotational distance and speed multiplier for this object's Options.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker.GetRotateOffset
member.summary: Fetches the rotational central offset for this object's Options.

member.name: T:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption
member.summary: An item class powered by TILER2 which provides the main API related to the Options/Multiples.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.SupportMinionType(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a support for a minion for them to gain Options.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the minion.
member.returns: True if the minion is supported. False if it is already supported.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.UnsupportMinionType(System.String)
member.summary: Removes support for a minion so that they do not acquire Options.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the minion.
member.returns: True if the minion is not supported anymore. False if it is already unsupported.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.SetToRotateOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Lets the minion use Rotate Options.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the minion.
member.returns: True if the minion is successfully set to use Rotate Options. False if it is already using Rotate Options.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.SetRotateOptionMultiplier(System.String,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the rotation multiplier for a minion type. This multiplier affects the distance and speed of rotation.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the minion.
The multiplier value.
member.returns: True if the values are set. False if not.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.SetRotateOptionOffset(System.String,UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Sets the offset center position for a minion type. Options will rotate around the offset.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the minion.
The offset value.
member.returns: True if the values are set. False if not.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.SetToRegularOptions(System.String)
member.summary: Lets the minion use Regular Options.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the minion.
member.returns: True if the minion is successfully set to use Regular Options. False if it is already using Regular Options.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.LoopAllMinions(RoR2.CharacterMaster,System.Action{UnityEngine.GameObject})
member.summary: Loops through the all the minions of the owner.
member.param: The owner of the minions.
An action to execute for each minion. The minion's CharacterBody GameObject is given as the input.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.FireForAllOptions(RoR2.CharacterBody,System.Action{UnityEngine.GameObject,Chen.GradiusMod.OptionBehavior,UnityEngine.GameObject})
member.summary: Loops through all the Options of the minion.
member.param: The owner of the option.
An action to execute for each Option. The inputs are as follows: GameObject option, OptionBehavior behavior, GameObject target.

member.name: M:Chen.GradiusMod.GradiusOption.OptionSync(RoR2.CharacterBody,System.Action{UnityEngine.Networking.NetworkIdentity,Chen.GradiusMod.OptionTracker},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method that provides the Network Identity and Option Tracker for easier syncing. Sync logic should be provided in actionToRun.
member.param: The owner of the option.
The sync action to perform. Inputs are as follows: NetworkIdentity optionIdentity, OptionTracker tracker.
If true, the Option tracker is automatically queried. If false, the Option tracker will not be queried.
